metadata.description: When we meet Makoto and Kei in "Love Soul", they've already known each other for years - now see how it all began! Makoto and Kei met at a biker-gang gathering. The free-spirited and feisty Kei quickly became Makoto's ideal. By the time both of them entered high school, they had become inseparable friends who always did everything together.
metadata.name: Facing the Incoming Wind
